oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Policies for a greener agriculture: the agro-ecological approach of current programs in Brazil.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abreu, Lucimar Santiago de
Almeida, Gustavo Ferreira
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Based a multiple-cases-study approach, our main objective is to discuss to what extent the new political approach of 2003 has been able so far to obtain and increase concrete progress in rural areas in Brazil.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Abreu, Lucimar Santiago de and Almeida, Gustavo Ferreira (2011) Policies for a greener agriculture: the agro-ecological approach of current programs in Brazil. [Políticas para a agricultura mais verde: a abordagem agro-ecológica de programas atuais no Brasil.] In: Inequality and Diversity in European Rural Areas, European Society for Rural Sociology, ., pp. 69-70.
